title: Lost Password
description: Lost your password? Please enter your username or email address. You will receive a link to create a new password via email.

messages.successMessage: We've sent a password reset link to your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions.
messages.errorMessage: Failed to send reset link. Please try again.
messages.userNotFound: No account found with this username or email address.
messages.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
messages.fieldRequired: Username or email address is required.

instructions.followLink: Click the link in the email to reset your password
instructions.checkSpam: Don't see the email? Check your spam folder
